title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in java.io.File, the search results are not selected in the external jar.
EB: You should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir() when searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in java.io.File.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar). 2. Open java.io.File. 3. Select the field 'tmpFir'. 4. Search for references to the selected field.
